joiValidation.string.base64: {{#label}} must be a valid base64 string
joiValidation.string.dataUri: {{#label}} must be a valid dataUri string
joiValidation.string.domain: {{#label}} must contain a valid domain name
joiValidation.string.empty: {{#label}} is not allowed to be empty
joiValidation.string.hexAlign: {{#label}} hex decoded representation must be byte aligned
joiValidation.string.ip: {{#label}} must be a valid ip address with a {{#cidr}} CIDR
joiValidation.string.ipVersion: {{#label}} must be a valid ip address of one of the following versions {{#version}} with a {{#cidr}} CIDR
joiValidation.string.isoDuration: {{#label}} must be a valid ISO 8601 duration
joiValidation.string.max: {{#label}} length must be less than or equal to {{#limit}} characters long
joiValidation.string.min: {{#label}} length must be at least {{#limit}} characters long
joiValidation.string.normalize: {{#label}} must be unicode normalized in the {{#form}} form
joiValidation.string.token: {{#label}} must only contain alpha-numeric and underscore characters
joiValidation.string.pattern.base: {{#label}} with value {:[.]} fails to match the required pattern: {{#regex}}
joiValidation.string.pattern.name: {{#label}} with value {:[.]} fails to match the {{#name}} pattern
joiValidation.string.pattern.invert.base: {{#label}} with value {:[.]} matches the inverted pattern: {{#regex}}
joiValidation.string.pattern.invert.name: {{#label}} with value {:[.]} matches the inverted {{#name}} pattern
joiValidation.string.trim: {{#label}} must not have leading or trailing whitespace
joiValidation.string.uriCustomScheme: {{#label}} must be a valid uri with a scheme matching the {{#scheme}} pattern
joiValidation.string.uriRelativeOnly: {{#label}} must be a valid relative uri
